wiski ugurak katata hala gaththu mama boma siruwata malak othanna patan gaththa.mata hithe ekalasaya nathuwa siruwata karanna hakiyawak shesha wela thibunu ekama katayuththa echcharayi.podi kard bod thiruwakata hira wechchi filatar kalla wata kara gaththu kole maddata mapata angili dabara angili kelawarin boma siruwata polithin pakattuwen eliyata adila aapu ganja kola athireddi mathaka waguraka erila kunu wewi pahawamin windawana santhanayama ek asillakata sansun una..othapu suruttu agissa diwa agin themala kelora alawala ahawara keruwa wahama nimeshayakata hiri watunu hithata yalith wedanawa kandu wenna patan gaththa..nodanima sakkuwata adila giya dakunathe keloraka ellunu filtare sakkuwen eliyata ebila baluwa.

oba wahanse obe sewaka diwasiwarayan mangin porondu wu lesa oba thaman kopayath, udahasath apa pita paminew seka. 21 ee manda, diwasiwarayan thulin oba wahanse katha karamin, ”obe gela pahath kota babiloniyawe rajuta yatath wanna, ma obe muthunmiththanta dun deshayehi oba sama nawathi sitinnahu ya. 22 eheth samindanan wahansege handata sawan no di babiloniyawe rajuta yatath nowannahu nam, 23 ”mama juda nuwarawala ha jerusalamehi withiwala manalayage saha manaliyage katahanda da prithighoshawa ha winodaya da nihanda karannemi.

mekata sthuthi wewaparana maduwe indala mata athi wuwahaki ikmanin mama mekata goda wuwaaragena mada warew mata monawada oowa...gith mokada buranuye ballek wagematanam eheth me paththath eka wagebayilawalata umbaa hari aasa wagewada bayila kiyamuda heta dina wage...kawda yako lanu damme ape diltadagannatayi datha kanne eya waptaeewa koheda mama innawa dana gantawap baya nowi wara mama innawa umbaata...yama raju monawatada umbaa ammane kalidil umbaa innakal thawa mokatada kaliwaptama halanne ayi umbaa pal haliwageyi madaya nathi umbaa playiwud lali...yakku ganama monawada me kiyana kathaahagena inne kohomada mama nathuwa kathagahuwath umbaata mada anala thadin ithahitha riddanna nam mage na kisima hitha...dil dil nage dannam mata dukath daneayi umbaa enne patalennata wage anema ekkala patalunothin hondata daneeekayi kiyanne samen hindinu mane...aawe mamath pennannata tikak wadakellan methana inna ko nane hadahathara watetama thibunath kothek madamata kam nathe mama nelumak wageyi hada...hipo thalayi mada supurudu lesin waledil ha ekathu wi sahayogenma bolemewa dakina mata sihi na wageyi moledennama ekata banda yawamuda gilimale...ahinsakawa hiti wapata mada gahaladiltayi hipotayi hondahati thadawiladennam umbaala dennata kirala manalakalisam athath nathuwath api na watila...dil hata hithuna muth karanata sumiya kishipo awith thabuwayi dennatama desme wada asse dilge bath ekath roskannata wela dan thambagenama kos...elowata giyath mama yali melowata enneee aa pasuth na umbaanam hara yannemage bella kadanata umbaa sarasenneeewata kalin mama umbaa gena pana yanne...hipo bayawela galawunu kalisamatadan aa soyayi kattandiyek thowilayataotharam bayayi nam umbaa nawith mehetadanmama gihin panapan umbae mada walata...wapa nathath mama thani wila naththesumindayayi sasindrayayi mage paththepanala yanna ma samagin dil aththeane hipo umbaamayi thaniwi aththe...hipo mokada dan hingaman ayadinnemadurangatath mukuluwa dagena yannewada karannata baruwada dangalanneparaduma piliaran yannada sarasenne...pana yana ekath ma ha joli kiyaladilmayi kiwuwe pera kawiyen gothalapoddak musikaya ehe mehe koralabaluwoth peneyi me aththayi kiyala...wapa motada allannata mata pandamgon banak wuwa kam na denawanamirisiyawa nam honda na me andamennata kamathinam obatath na thahanam...apoyi hipo oowa nam katha wadayagahuwoth madak mama nam eya munatayathawa thawa mada gasa mokatada wap nathiyainna ekektama gahana eka hondaya...wawlek wunath mama uda elli gaththakawi gothanawa helawi yannata paththanulak aran ambaara mada ga gaththaamuna pabalu ellanawa uda aththa...dilisenu balannata nam pabaluge malagannata wenawamayi maha muhude obalamethuwak dawas honda hatiyata mada nalamadiwilada thawa thawa kanne illa...menna pabalu denawalu mada guli karalakuruminiyek wage kana goma guli hadalamata hari dukayi umbaa gana kanduluth galalapisada lanna ennada gamatama kiyala...madanam thibuna muth aduwak nathuwa thadinmama hitiyane nelumak wage eeta udinumbaa hitiyanam ee mohothedi mage langinsaththayi aran yanawamayi samata horen...made ipadila hadila wadunu nisapabaluta oowa loku na mada purudu nisaenamuth nage me mada hari napuru nisaparissam wela hitiyoth eeka yasa...pabaluge hithata hondatama ridila hindamata paw kiya hithenawa andana hindamage kata kohomatath wadi honda nathi hindamata hari dukayi nangiye umbaa podi hinda...podiyi kiya hithalayi mama dunne midiaawoth ohoma dennam galawenna redikotharam gasuwamuth mata ridawanna wadima andawanna nam oya hondatoma madi...me
